00059 
00060   void process_event(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00061     int32_t error;
00062     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00063     size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00064     uint32_t offset, len;
00065     if (decode_remain == 0)
00066       cout << "success" << endl;
00067     else {
00068       while (decode_remain) {
00069         try {
00070           error = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00071           offset = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00072           len = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00073         }
00074         catch (Exception &e) {
00075           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00076           break;
00077         }
00078         cout << "rejected: offset=" << offset << " span=" << len << " "
00079              << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00080       }
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00084 }

00086 RangeServerCommandInterpreter::RangeServerCommandInterpreter(Comm *comm,
00087     Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr, const sockaddr_in addr,
00088     RangeServerClientPtr &range_server_ptr)
00089   : m_comm(comm), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace_ptr), m_addr(addr),
00090     m_range_server_ptr(range_server_ptr), m_cur_scanner_id(-1) {
00091   HqlHelpText::install_range_server_client_text();
00092   return;
00093 }

00096 void RangeServerCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00097   TableIdentifier *table = 0;
00098   RangeSpec range;
00099   TableInfo *table_info;
00100   String schema_str;
00101   String out_str;
00102   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00103   Hql::ParserState state;
00104   Hql::Parser parser(state);
00105   parse_info<> info;
00106   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00107   ScanBlock scanblock;
00108   int32_t scanner_id;
00109   EventPtr event_ptr;
00110 
00111   info = parse(line.c_str(), parser, space_p);
00112 
00113   if (info.full) {
00114 
00115     // if table name specified, get associated objects
00116     if (state.table_name != "") {
00117       table_info = m_table_map[state.table_name];
00118       if (table_info == 0) {
00119         table_info = new TableInfo(state.table_name);
00120         table_info->load(m_hyperspace_ptr);
00121         m_table_map[state.table_name] = table_info;
00122       }
00123       table = table_info->get_table_identifier();
00124       table_info->get_schema_ptr(schema_ptr);
00125     }
00126 
00127     // if end row is "??", transform it to 0xff 0xff
00128     if (state.range_end_row == "??")
00129       state.range_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00130 
00131     if (state.command == COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE) {
00132       RangeState range_state;
00133 
00134       cout << "TableName  = " << state.table_name << endl;
00135       cout << "StartRow   = " << state.range_start_row << endl;
00136       cout << "EndRow     = " << state.range_end_row << endl;
00137 
00138       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00139       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00140 
00141       range_state.soft_limit = 200000000LL;
00142 
00143       m_range_server_ptr->load_range(m_addr, *table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00144 
00145     }
00146     else if (state.command == COMMAND_UPDATE) {
00147       TestSource *tsource = 0;
00148 
00149       if (!FileUtils::exists(state.input_file.c_str()))
00150         HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, String("Input file '")
00151                  + state.input_file + "' does not exist");
00152 
00153       tsource = new TestSource(state.input_file, schema_ptr.get());
00154 
00155       uint8_t *send_buf = 0;
00156       size_t   send_buf_len = 0;
00157       DynamicBuffer buf(BUFFER_SIZE);
00158       SerializedKey key;
00159       ByteString value;
00160       size_t key_len, value_len;
00161       uint32_t send_count = 0;
00162       bool outstanding = false;
00163 
00164       while (true) {
00165 
00166         while (tsource->next(key, value)) {
00167           key_len = key.length();
00168           value_len = value.length();
00169           buf.ensure(key_len + value_len);
00170           buf.add_unchecked(key.ptr, key_len);
00171           buf.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00172           if (buf.fill() > BUFFER_SIZE)
00173             break;
00174         }
00175 
00179         if (buf.fill()) {
00180           std::vector<SerializedKey> keys;
00181           const uint8_t *ptr;
00182           size_t len;
00183 
00184           key.ptr = ptr = buf.base;
00185 
00186           while (ptr < buf.ptr) {
00187             keys.push_back(key);
00188             key.next();
00189             key.next();
00190             ptr = key.ptr;
00191           }
00192 
00193           std::sort(keys.begin(), keys.end());
00194 
00195           send_buf = new uint8_t [buf.fill()];
00196           uint8_t *sendp = send_buf;
00197           for (size_t i=0; i<keys.size(); i++) {
00198             key = keys[i];
00199             key.next();
00200             key.next();
00201             len = key.ptr - keys[i].ptr;
00202             memcpy(sendp, keys[i].ptr, len);
00203             sendp += len;
00204           }
00205           send_buf_len = sendp - send_buf;
00206           buf.clear();
00207           send_count = keys.size();
00208         }
00209         else {
00210           send_buf_len = 0;
00211           send_count = 0;
00212         }
00213 
00214         if (outstanding) {
00215           if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00216             HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00217                      (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00218           process_event(event_ptr);
00219         }
00220 
00221         outstanding = false;
00222 
00223         if (send_buf_len > 0) {
00224           StaticBuffer mybuf(send_buf, send_buf_len);
00225           m_range_server_ptr->update(m_addr, *table, send_count, mybuf,
00226                                      &sync_handler);
00227           outstanding = true;
00228         }
00229         else
00230           break;
00231       }
00232 
00233       if (outstanding) {
00234         if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00235           HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00236                    (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00237         process_event(event_ptr);
00238       }
00239 
00240     }
00241     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER) {
00242       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00243       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00244       m_range_server_ptr->create_scanner(m_addr, *table, range,
00245           state.scan.builder.get(), scanblock);
00246       m_cur_scanner_id = scanblock.get_scanner_id();
00247 
00248       SerializedKey key;
00249       ByteString value;
00250 
00251       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00252         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00253 
00254       if (scanblock.eos())
00255         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00256 
00257     }
00258     else if (state.command == COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK) {
00259 
00260       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00261         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00262           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_SCANNER_ID,
00263                    "No currently open scanner");
00264         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00265         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00266       }
00267       else
00268         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00269 
00272       m_range_server_ptr->fetch_scanblock(m_addr, scanner_id, scanblock);
00273 
00274       SerializedKey key;
00275       ByteString value;
00276 
00277       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00278         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00279 
00280       if (scanblock.eos())
00281         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00282 
00283     }
00284     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER) {
00285 
00286       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00287         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00288           return;
00289         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00290         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00291       }
00292       else
00293         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00294 
00295       m_range_server_ptr->destroy_scanner(m_addr, scanner_id);
00296 
00297     }
00298     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DROP_RANGE) {
00299 
00300       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00301       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00302 
00303       m_range_server_ptr->drop_range(m_addr, *table, range, &sync_handler);
00304 
00305       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00306         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00307                  (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00308 
00309     }
00310     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_BEGIN) {
00311       // fix me!!  added metadata boolean
00312       m_range_server_ptr->replay_begin(m_addr, false, &sync_handler);
00313       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00314         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00315                  (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00316     }
00317     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_LOG) {
00318       cout << "Not implemented." << endl;
00319     }
00320     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_COMMIT) {
00321       m_range_server_ptr->replay_commit(m_addr, &sync_handler);
00322       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00323         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00324                  (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00325     }
00326     else if (state.command == COMMAND_HELP) {
00327       const char **text = HqlHelpText::get(state.str);
00328       if (text) {
00329         for (size_t i=0; text[i]; i++)
00330           cout << text[i] << endl;
00331       }
00332       else
00333         cout << endl << "no help for '" << state.str << "'" << endl << endl;
00334     }
00335     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SHUTDOWN) {
00336       m_range_server_ptr->shutdown(m_addr);
00337     }
00338     else
00339       HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "unsupported command");
00340   }
00341   else
00342     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, String("parse error at: ") + info.stop);
00343 }

00350 void
00351 RangeServerCommandInterpreter::display_scan_data(const SerializedKey &serkey,
00352                                                  const ByteString &value,
00353                                                  SchemaPtr &schema_ptr) {
00354   Key key(serkey);
00355   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00356 
00357   if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00358     cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " DELETE" << endl;
00359   }
00360   else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY) {
00361      cf = schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code);
00362      cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " " << cf->name << " DELETE"
00363           << endl;
00364   }
00365   else {
00366     if (key.column_family_code > 0) {
00367       cf = schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code);
00368       if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL)
00369         cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " " << cf->name << ":"
00370              << key.column_qualifier << " DELETE" << endl;
00371       else {
00372         cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " " << cf->name << ":"
00373              << key.column_qualifier;
00374         cout << endl;
00375       }
00376     }
00377     else {
00378       cerr << "Bad column family (" << (int)key.column_family_code
00379            << ") for row key " << key.row;
00380       cerr << endl;
00381     }
00382   }
00383 }
